text: My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Andrew's charming apartment.  Though she doesn't like stairs, she didn't mind climbing one flight to this place, which was spotlessly clean, which included a little office off the bedroom (where I could do some business on my laptop), and which was furnished with everything we needed--including all the makings for a full breakfast each morning.  Andrew welcomed us graciously, helped us with our suitcase, and came at once when I asked him about working the TV set.  (It helps that he lives downstairs in the same building.)  Altogether, this is easily one of the best places we've rented through AirBnB.
title: Brownstone in Brooklyn Heights
